title: LED Controller
description: Discord Bot that controls LED light strip in real time.

title: Digital Hall Pass Mock-Up
description: Basic webapp to track time and destination of students.
content: I completed this project in Highschool using simple React and Node.js, effectively tracked time out, destination, and origin of students to eliminate the need for manual tracking.

title: Auto Cat Feeder
content: Designed and prototyped an automatic cat feeder that releases kibble at specified times and tracks weight as to not overfill. Implemented a simple hopper design with a servo and a DS3231 RTC module to keep track of time. Also designed a way to track weight using a load cell and an HX711 module to eliminate overfilling.

title: Auto Blind Opener
description: Arduino-based automatic blind opener with scheduling.
